title: Facebook font - momified
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091103063739im_/http:/typophile.com/files/mom_4011.gif)

ha ha.. I laughed when I saw this... what font is it by the way?
author: rosmedia

comments.content:
thanx Jan

I see you also have a Roman inscription as avatar.  
What font do you think is the closest to the original Roman stonechoppingwriting?

I use Trajan... but I amn’t completly satisfied. Any suggestions?

I hope the mods will not exterminate me for threading within a thread?!  
I reckon they will sew me or crucify me with needles
Ha, my Avatar is actually a clipping from the inscription on the Trajan column in Rome. My name is Jan – TraJan. So Adobe (or Goudy) Trajan is as close as you can get ;-)
